title: A Screeching U-turn? (With Ben Bradshaw MP)
itunes:title: A Screeching U-turn? (With Ben Bradshaw MP)
description:
After Boris Johnson survives a Commons amendment to this social care plans, Ben Bradshaw, Labour MP for Exeter, says he's unhappy the government has removed protections for older people on low and moderate incomes. He tells Bloomberg Westminster's Yuan Potts and Caroline Hepker, we shouldn't rule out a screeching U-turn.

Plus: Why are so many European countries being hit harder by Covid than the U.K.? Oksana Pyzik from the UCL School of Pharmacy brings us the latest research.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
